expo.name: Color Fashion Wheel
expo.description: Transform your fashion sense with AI-powered color analysis. Extract colors from photos, create stunning color collages, discover perfect outfit combinations, and share your style inspiration with our interactive color wheel technology.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Fashion Color Wheel uses the camera to capture colors from your outfits and surroundings for personalized color analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Fashion Color Wheel needs access to your photos to extract and analyze colors for your personal color palette.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Fashion Color Wheel saves your color palettes and style collages to your photo library for easy access.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Fashion Color Wheel uses the microphone only when recording style videos or tutorials.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Fashion Color Wheel to access your camera to capture colors from clothing and surroundings.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Fashion Color Wheel to access your photos to extract colors for analysis.
